About

Cursus programmeren.

Hyde is a Jekyll theme, designed and built by @mdo. Itâ€™s an elegant, open source, and mobile first theme for quickly getting a static site up and running.

Setup

Some fun facts about the setup of this project include:

  • Built for Jekyll
  • Developed on GitHub and hosted for free on GitHub Pages
  • Fonts PT Sans (headings) and PT Serif (body), and are served by Google Web Fonts
  • Coded with Sublime Text 2, an amazing code editor
  • Designed and developed while listening to music like Blood Bros Trilogy

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.

Thanks for reading!

ruby{prog}

Deze cursus is ontwikkeld door Geert Kapteijns en Boris Ponsioen. Het materiaal is vrij te gebruiken onder de CC BY-NC 4.0-licentie --- je mag er alles mee doen, zolang het maar niet-commercieel is.

Meehelpen? Zie de Github-pagina.

Alle kritiek is welkom. Mail naar ghkapteijns@gmail.com.
